summary: Add a standalone follower inspired by ZONE-tan to the game, available for CBBE Vanilla and UNP body
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][size=6]ZONE-tan Follower[/size][/size][size=3]

Add a standalone follower inspired by ZONE-tan to the game
available for CBBE Vanilla and UNP body
[/size]
